articles.title: Le Pen et Bardella organisent une fête politique avec des invités européens
articles.english_title: Le Pen and Bardella Host Political Rally with European Far-Right Leaders
articles.simplified_french_title: Le Pen et Bardella organisent une fête politique avec des invités européens
articles.simplified_english_title: Le Pen and Bardella Host Political Rally with European Far-Right Leaders
articles.summary: Une grande fête politique du Rassemblement national aura lieu lundi dans une petite commune du Loiret, pour célébrer leur victoire aux élections européennes.
articles.english_summary: The National Rally party is organizing a large political celebration on Monday in a small town in Loiret to commemorate their victory in the European elections.
articles.french_summary: Une grande fête politique du Rassemblement national aura lieu lundi dans une petite commune du Loiret, pour célébrer leur victoire aux élections européennes.
articles.original_article_title: Viktor Orban invité, une contre-manifestation organisée... Ce que l'on sait du rassemblement de l'extrême droite européenne autour de Marine Le Pen et Jordan Bardella dans le Loiret

Viktor Orban.explanation: Hungarian political leader known for his conservative nationalist policies
Viktor Orban.cultural_note: A controversial figure in European politics, often criticized for his anti-EU stance and authoritarian tendencies

invité.explanation: Past participle of 'inviter' (to invite), used here as a noun

contre-manifestation.explanation: A protest organized in opposition to another event or demonstration
contre-manifestation.cultural_note: Counter-protests are common in French political culture, especially regarding far-right gatherings

rassemblement.explanation: A organized gathering of people for a political purpose
rassemblement.cultural_note: The word has special significance as it's part of the party name 'Rassemblement national'

extrême droite européenne.explanation: Refers to nationalist and conservative political parties and movements in Europe
extrême droite européenne.cultural_note: A controversial term in French politics, often used to describe nationalist and anti-immigration political movements

Marine Le Pen.display_format: **Marine Le Pen:** French far-right political leader
Marine Le Pen.explanation: Leader of the National Rally party and prominent French political figure
Marine Le Pen.cultural_note: Daughter of Jean-Marie Le Pen, she has worked to modernize her party's image while maintaining nationalist positions

Jordan Bardella.explanation: President of the National Rally party and Member of the European Parliament
Jordan Bardella.cultural_note: A rising figure in French far-right politics, notable for his young age and close association with Le Pen

Loiret.explanation: An administrative department in north-central France
Loiret.cultural_note: Part of the Centre-Val de Loire region, known for its agricultural areas and historical châteaux

articles.title: Violence politique en Colombie: un opposant attaqué
articles.english_title: Political Violence in Colombia: Opposition Leader Attacked
articles.simplified_french_title: Violence politique en Colombie: un opposant attaqué
articles.simplified_english_title: Political Violence in Colombia: Opposition Leader Attacked
articles.summary: Un adolescent a tiré sur Miguel Uribe Turbay, un politicien de l'opposition. La victime est gravement blessée.
articles.english_summary: A teenager shot Miguel Uribe Turbay, an opposition politician from the Democratic Center party. The victim is in critical condition.
articles.french_summary: Un adolescent a tiré sur Miguel Uribe Turbay, un politicien de l'opposition. La victime est gravement blessée.
articles.original_article_title: Tensions politiques en Colombie après une tentative d’assassinat contre un dirigeant de l’opposition

Tensions politiques.explanation: Refers to strained relationships or conflicts between different political groups or parties
Tensions politiques.cultural_note: Political tensions in Colombia have historically been particularly volatile, often leading to violence

en Colombie.explanation: Refers to the Republic of Colombia, a country in South America
en Colombie.cultural_note: Colombia has a complex history of political violence and civil conflict spanning several decades

après.explanation: Indicates that something happened following another event

une tentative d'assassinat.display_format: **Assassination attempt:** An attempt to murder a prominent person
une tentative d'assassinat.explanation: A deliberate attempt to kill someone, typically a public or political figure
une tentative d'assassinat.cultural_note: Political assassinations and attempts have been recurring issues in Colombian politics

contre.explanation: Indicates the target or object of an action

un dirigeant.explanation: Someone who holds a position of authority or leadership

de l'opposition.explanation: Refers to political parties or groups that oppose the current government
de l'opposition.cultural_note: The opposition plays a crucial role in democratic systems as a check on government power

articles.title: Le FBI propose une récompense pour trouver un manifestant violent à Los Angeles
articles.english_title: FBI Offers Reward to Find Violent Protester in Los Angeles
articles.simplified_french_title: Le FBI propose une récompense pour trouver un manifestant violent à Los Angeles
articles.simplified_english_title: FBI Offers Reward to Find Violent Protester in Los Angeles
articles.summary: À Los Angeles, il y a des conflits entre la police et les manifestants qui protestent contre la politique d'immigration de Trump. Le FBI cherche une personne qui a blessé un policier.
articles.english_summary: In Los Angeles, there are ongoing conflicts between police and protesters demonstrating against Trump's immigration policy. The FBI is seeking a person who injured a police officer.
articles.french_summary: À Los Angeles, il y a des conflits entre la police et les manifestants qui protestent contre la politique d'immigration de Trump. Le FBI cherche une personne qui a blessé un policier.
articles.original_article_title: Los Angeles : le FBI offre 50 000 dollars pour toute information permettant d'arrêter un émeutier accusé d'avoir blessé un policier

FBI.explanation: The main federal law enforcement agency of the United States
FBI.cultural_note: While this is an American agency, French media commonly uses the acronym FBI without translation

offre.explanation: To propose or make available something

50 000 dollars.explanation: Note that in French, numbers use spaces instead of commas for thousands
50 000 dollars.cultural_note: French media typically keeps 'dollars' when referring to US currency rather than converting to euros

toute information.explanation: Used to indicate that any piece of relevant information would be accepted

permettant.explanation: Present participle meaning 'that would allow' or 'making it possible'

d'arrêter.display_format: **To arrest:** To apprehend or take into custody
d'arrêter.explanation: Infinitive form of the verb 'arrêter' when used after 'de'

émeutier.explanation: Someone who takes part in violent public disturbances
émeutier.cultural_note: More specific than 'manifestant' (protester) as it implies violent behavior

accusé.explanation: Past participle of 'accuser', indicating someone charged with an offense

d'avoir blessé.explanation: Past infinitive construction indicating a completed action

policier.explanation: A member of the police force
policier.cultural_note: In French, 'policier' can be both a noun (police officer) and an adjective (police-related)
